tool_description: Use 7 different Fitness Calculators with one API, Find "Ideal Body Weight", "BMI", "TDEE", "BMR", "ABSI", "Waist-hip Ratio" and "Body Fat Percentage".
name: Mega Fitness Calculator
title: Mega Fitness Calculator

api_list.name: Get Body Mass Index (BMI)
api_list.description:
**Health Status Available : **
- Under Weight
- Normal Weight
- Over Weight
- Obesity class I
- Obesity class II
- Obesity class III

api_list.name: Get Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE)
api_list.description:
TDEE is the total amount of calories burned when the activity rate is taken into account..

**Activity Level Possible Values**
-  se => sedentary
- la => lightly active
- ma => moderately active
- va => very active
- ea => extra active

api_list.name: Get A Body Shape Index (ABSI)
api_list.description:
ABSI index is used to estimate the risk of premature mortality based on health factors.
**Available Mortality Risk Status**
- Very Low
- Low 
- Average
- High
- Very High

api_list.name: Get Waist–Hip ratio (WHR)
api_list.description:
WHR is used to determine fat distribution in body and indicate the person’s overall health.
**Available Shapes Status**
- Pear
- Apple
*Available risk level Status*
- Low Health Risk
- Moderate Health Risk
- High Health Risk

api_list.name: Get Ideal Body Weight (IBW)
api_list.description:
*Get IBW in 4 different Formulas : *
- Robinson
-  Miller
- Devine
- Hamwi

api_list.name: Get Body Fat Percentage (BFP)
api_list.description:
Find BFP value , Total Fat Mass & Lean Mass (Weight of everything except fat)
*Available Health Status*
- Less than Essential Fat
- Essential Fat
- Athletes
- Fitness
- Acceptable
- Obese

api_list.name: Get Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR)
api_list.description: BMR  is the number of calories required to keep your body functioning at rest.
